attributes.action: Family hygiene should be on the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS do a lot for the country but having breast enlargements as part of it and not free family hygiene is disgusting.

Breast enlargements and contraception are a choice but a woman's menstrual cycle or a babies bladder control is not! They can not stop it.

This is morally unacceptable.

I want support on this petition to make products such as tampons and nappies available on the NHS.
